headline: Garetosmab Biologics License Application Accepted for FDA Priority Review for the Treatment of Fibrodysplasia Ossificans Progressiva (FOP)
summary: FOP is an ultra-rare genetic disorder characterized by abnormal bone formation that infiltrates muscles, tendons, ligaments and other connective tissues, resulting in significant disability If approved, garetosmab would be the first and only available treatment shown to reduce the number and volume of new heterotopic bone lesions in adults with FOP TARRYTOWN, N.Y., Feb. 19, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Regeneron Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: REGN) today announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Adminis
